doc:
Stuart Margolin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stuart_Margolin 0 Stuart Margolin (born January 31, 1940) is an American film and television actor and director probably best known for playing Evelyn "Angel" Martin on the 1970s television series The Rockford Files, for which he won two Emmy Awards. Stuart_Margolin ( born January_31_,_1940 ) is an_American_film_and_television_actor_and_director probably best_known for playing Evelyn_"_Angel_"_Martin on the_1970s_television_series The_Rockford_Files , for which he won two_Emmy_Awards .
